thread.title: SNL Books Matthew McConaughey, Adele

author: TV Guide
title: SNL Books Matthew McConaughey, Adele
text: SNL Books Matthew McConaughey, Adele Matthew McConaughey will bring the laughs and Adele... Comment   26, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:45 PM Posted Oct. 26, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:45 PM Matthew McConaughey will bring the laughs and Adele will bring the tears on a November episode of Saturday Night Live . McConaughey has been tapped to host the Nov. 21 episode, with Adele as the musical guest, NBC announced Monday. It will be McConaughey's first time hosting SNL since 2003. Adele previously appeared on the show behind her debut album, 19, in 2008, before she had broken big in the United States. The singer will be promoting her highly-anticipated upcoming album, 25, which will have been released the day before SNL airs. Listen to first single "Hello" here . As previously announced , Donald Trump and Elizabeth Banks will also host SNL Nov. 7 and Nov. 14, respectively. Other Links From TVGuide.com
